title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Encountering a strange behavior while copying a package in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui within jdt.ui.
OB: When attempting to copy a package within the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' of the 'jdt.ui', the result is that the destination project ('xx') now contains an unexpected package named 'ui'.
EB: The 'copy package' operation should create an exact copy of the selected package without introducing any additional subpackages.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new project named 'xxx'.
2. Open the Package Viewer in the project.
3. Select a package within project 'A' (e.g., 'Ae') from the Package Viewer.
4. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
